title: How Would (Your Favorite Champion) React To Being Eaten By Chompers?
body:
If you aren't aware, Chompers is Fizz's pet shark and after a game where I might of  accidentally ( watched with a smile on my face as I fed Chomper a poor unsuspecting Gnar 3 different times during one game just because I wanted to test the passive) triggered the yordle eating passive while playing a game and it made me wonder how said champion would react in the situation. They really should let it just eat anyone it kills, it'd be pretty funny. Yes, remove all logic from this situation and apply the whole shark just devoured the champion without chewing at all (You know like in cartoons whenever this happens or Sharknado) and they're still completely alive. (Btw: this was meant or SFW purposes so you know...)

**Heres Mine:**
{{champion:29}} "It smells just like home in here!"
{{champion:35}} "Good thing that was my clone."

replies.body:
{{champion:55}} *Spins and cuts Chompers in half*
{{champion:76}} "Did I mention its mating season?" Cougar shark hybrids are made.
I honestly thought you were talking about jinx e until i clicked on it... :/

{{champion:45}} "I WILL HAVE MY REVENGE!"
and
{{champion:31}} "mmhh" *proceeds to slowly eat chompers from the inside out*
